summary: A comprehensive test suite for Lightning Fabric's utility layer, covering tensor conversion, device and dtype handling, distributed primitives, cloud I/O selection, checkpoint consolidation parsing, data loader and sampler utilities, lazy loading, logging helpers, optimizer state migration, rank‑zero detection, plugin registry loading, conditional test execution, seed management, spike detection, throughput measurement, and warning emission.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, reproducibility, and user‑friendly behavior of Fabric's core helper functions across diverse hardware, distributed setups, and runtime environments, thereby reducing bugs and improving developer confidence in the framework.
